Package ac.code.verifier.engine

Class CodeFragmentPropertiesParser

java.lang.Object
ac.code.verifier.engine.ParserHelper
ac.code.verifier.engine.CodeFragmentPropertiesParser
public class CodeFragmentPropertiesParser extends ParserHelper
The CodeFragmentPropertiesParser class adds checks related to code fragments.

    • CodeFragmentPropertiesParser

      public CodeFragmentPropertiesParser(String pFilePath, String pMarkOfBegin, String pMarkOfEnd, String pAnotation, String pFragmentName, String pActionVerb) throws IOException, FailedVerifyException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      pFilePath - The path to the file containing the annotation.
      pMarkOfBegin - The mark of the beginning of a code fragment.
      pMarkOfEnd - The mark of the end of a code fragment.
      pAnotation - The annotation we want to test.
      pFragmentName - The name of the fragment.
      pActionVerb - The verb of the annotation.
      Throws:
      IOException
      FailedVerifyException

    • CodeFragmentPropertiesParser

      CodeFragmentPropertiesParser(String pFilePath, boolean pReferToComments, String pMarkOfBegin, String pMarkOfEnd, String pAnotation, String pFragmentName) throws IOException, FailedVerifyException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      pFilePath - The path to the file containing the annotation.
      pMarkOfBegin - The mark of the beginning of a code fragment.
      pMarkOfEnd - The mark of the end of a code fragment.
      pAnotation - The annotation we want to test.
      pFragmentName - The name of the fragment.
      pReferToComments - Determines whether to include the comments in AST.
      Throws:
      IOException
      FailedVerifyException
